graph.original_query: Create a professional one-page (index.html) dark-themed (Black and White only) portfolio website for a Software Hacker using Tailwind CSS, Flowbite, Animate.css (for scroll-in section reveals and CTA hover transitions), and Splide.js (for a testimonial carousel and horizontally scrolling image gallery); use CDN only (no build tools); apply a sleek black/charcoal base, warm beige/muted orange accents, elegant typography, refined spacing, subtle transitions (no glows/neons); include sticky header with anchor links, hero section with fullscreen image (https://picsum.photos/1600/900?blur=1), category highlight cards (https://picsum.photos/400/600?grayscale/random=1), animated counters (clients, projects, years), About (mission, timeline), Gallery or Services grid (6–8 projects), Contact form (name/email/message), and footer with social icons; keep layout responsive and professional, with no lorem ipsum, real readable text, and pure HTML/CSS/JS; Use CoderAgent in 9–10 precise updates (meta, header, hero, counters, cards, timeline, gallery, testimonial slider, contact form, layout cleanup), and finally audit spacing, contrast, and visual balance to ensure premium Software Hacker look. Ask the CoderAgent to update the same index.html, use code to update it if file is longer and make sure old content is not deleted, and only required sections are updated. Remind CoderAgent to update the placeholders (not overwrite whole file)

T001.initial_thoughts: Okay, I need to create the basic HTML structure for a one-page portfolio website with a dark theme (Black and White only). This includes meta tags, a title, and links to Tailwind CSS, Flowbite, Animate.css, and Splide.js CDNs. I also need to add placeholders for various sections using comments. The file name should be index.html. I will use direct file creation for this task as it involves creating a new HTML file.

files.index.html:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Software Hacker Portfolio</title>
    <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/tailwindcss@2.2.19/dist/tailwind.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flowbite/2.3.0/flowbite.min.css" rel="stylesheet" />
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/animate.css/4.1.1/animate.min.css"/>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@splidejs/splide@4.1.4/dist/css/splide.min.css">
    <style>
        body {
            background-color: #111;
            color: #fff;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>

    <!-- HEADER_START --><!-- HEADER_END -->

    <!-- HERO_START --><!-- HERO_END -->

    <!-- COUNTERS_START --><!-- COUNTERS_END -->

    <!-- CARDS_START --><!-- CARDS_END -->

    <!-- ABOUT_START --><!-- ABOUT_END -->

    <!-- GALLERY_START --><!-- GALLERY_END -->

    <!-- TESTIMONIALS_START --><!-- TESTIMONIALS_END -->

    <!-- CONTACT_START --><!-- CONTACT_END -->

    <!-- FOOTER_START --><!-- FOOTER_END -->

    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flowbite/2.3.0/flowbite.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@splidejs/splide@4.1.4/dist/js/splide.min.js"></script>
</body>
</html>

nodes.description: Create the basic HTML structure for the portfolio website, including meta tags, title, and links to Tailwind CSS, Flowbite, Animate.css, and Splide.js CDNs. Use a dark theme (Black and White only). Add placeholders for the header, hero section, category highlight cards, animated counters, about section, gallery, contact form, and footer.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a basic HTML structure for a one-page portfolio website with a dark theme (Black and White only). Include meta tags, a title, and links to Tailwind CSS, Flowbite, Animate.css, and Splide.js CDNs. Add placeholders for the following sections, using comments to clearly mark the start and end of each section: <!-- HEADER_START --><!-- HEADER_END -->, <!-- HERO_START --><!-- HERO_END -->, <!-- COUNTERS_START --><!-- COUNTERS_END -->, <!-- CARDS_START --><!-- CARDS_END -->, <!-- ABOUT_START --><!-- ABOUT_END -->, <!-- GALLERY_START --><!-- GALLERY_END -->, <!-- TESTIMONIALS_START --><!-- TESTIMONIALS_END -->, <!-- CONTACT_START --><!-- CONTACT_END -->, <!-- FOOTER_START --><!-- FOOTER_END -->. Ensure the HTML file is named index.html.

files.index.html:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Software Hacker Portfolio</title>
    <link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/tailwindcss@2.2.19/dist/tailwind.min.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flowbite/2.3.0/flowbite.min.css" rel="stylesheet" />
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/animate.css/4.1.1/animate.min.css"/>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@splidejs/splide@4.1.4/dist/css/splide.min.css">
    <style>
        body {
            background-color: #111;
            color: #fff;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>

    <!-- HEADER_START --><!-- HEADER_END -->

    <!-- HERO_START --><!-- HERO_END -->

    <!-- COUNTERS_START --><!-- COUNTERS_END -->

    <!-- CARDS_START --><!-- CARDS_END -->

    <!-- ABOUT_START --><!-- ABOUT_END -->

    <!-- GALLERY_START --><!-- GALLERY_END -->

    <!-- TESTIMONIALS_START --><!-- TESTIMONIALS_END -->

    <!-- CONTACT_START --><!-- CONTACT_END -->

    <!-- FOOTER_START --><!-- FOOTER_END -->

    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flowbite/2.3.0/flowbite.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@splidejs/splide@4.1.4/dist/js/splide.min.js"></script>
</body>
</html>

nodes.description: Implement the sticky header with anchor links to different sections of the page. Use Tailwind CSS for styling and Flowbite for interactive components.
nodes.agent_prompt: Update the index.html file, find the <!-- HEADER_START --><!-- HEADER_END --> placeholder. Implement a sticky header with anchor links to the hero, about, gallery, and contact sections. Style the header using Tailwind CSS for a dark theme (Black and White only) with beige/muted orange accents. Use Flowbite components if needed for interactive elements. Make sure other content is preserved.

nodes.description: Create the hero section with a full-screen image from https://picsum.photos/1600/900?blur=1 and a brief introduction about the software hacker.
nodes.agent_prompt: Update the index.html file, find the <!-- HERO_START --><!-- HERO_END --> placeholder. Implement the hero section with a full-screen image from https://picsum.photos/1600/900?blur=1. Add a brief introduction about the software hacker with elegant typography and refined spacing. Use Tailwind CSS for styling. Make sure other content is preserved.

nodes.description: Implement the animated counters for clients, projects, and years of experience. Use Tailwind CSS for styling and Animate.css for the animation.
nodes.agent_prompt: Update the index.html file, find the <!-- COUNTERS_START --><!-- COUNTERS_END --> placeholder. Implement animated counters for clients, projects, and years of experience. Use Tailwind CSS for styling and Animate.css for the animation effects when the counters come into view. Ensure counters start from 0 and end at plausible values for a software hacker.  Make sure other content is preserved.

Use Tailwind CSS for styling and subtle transitions on hover using Animate.css. Display 3-4 cards. Make sure other content is preserved.

nodes.description: Implement the About section with a mission statement and a timeline of the software hacker's career.

nodes.description: Create the Gallery or Services grid with 6–8 projects, showcasing the software hacker's work.

nodes.description: Implement the testimonial carousel using Splide.js to display client testimonials.
nodes.agent_prompt: Update the index.html file, find the <!-- TESTIMONIALS_START --><!-- TESTIMONIALS_END --> placeholder. Implement the testimonial carousel using Splide.js to display client testimonials. Use Tailwind CSS for styling. Add at least 3 testimonials. Make sure other content is preserved.

nodes.description: Create the Contact form with name, email, and message fields.
nodes.agent_prompt: Update the index.html file, find the <!-- CONTACT_START --><!-- CONTACT_END --> placeholder. Create the Contact form with name, email, and message fields. Use Tailwind CSS for styling and a clean, professional look. Make sure other content is preserved.

nodes.description: Implement the footer with social icons and a copyright notice.
nodes.agent_prompt: Update the index.html file, find the <!-- FOOTER_START --><!-- FOOTER_END --> placeholder. Implement the footer with social icons and a copyright notice. Use Tailwind CSS for styling and a dark theme.  Make sure other content is preserved.

nodes.description: Perform a final audit of spacing, contrast, and visual balance to ensure a premium Software Hacker look. Clean up any layout issues and ensure responsiveness.
nodes.agent_prompt: Update the index.html file. Audit the entire page for spacing, contrast, and visual balance to ensure a premium Software Hacker look. Clean up any layout issues and ensure responsiveness across different screen sizes. Ensure all sections are well-integrated and the overall design is cohesive. Do not add or remove functionality, only apply styling and visual improvements. Make sure content already on the page are preserved.

nodes.description: Distill the final HTML output from the CoderAgent into a concise summary of the changes made and the overall structure of the page.
nodes.agent_prompt: Distill the HTML output from T011 into a concise summary of the changes made and the overall structure of the page, highlighting the key sections and their functionality.
